title: Beardapps
title_page: Добро пожаловать к моему портфолио - Владимир Кратюк
full_description: Over the last 7 years I have developed a lot of desktop, mobile(iOS/Android) and serverside applications for small business or private clients. I have a lot of experience in web - development also.

I have a good knowledge in programing and I can help you to develop your projects. I am a highly motivated and hard working person. Your tasks will be completed on time with 100% quality and accuracy.
Please contact me if you need any help of experienced programmer.
